quote: No wise pilot, no matter how great his talent and experiance fails to use a checklist.
author: Charlie munger

quote: Put yourself on top of your to do list
author: Anonymous

quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
author: Charles Buxton

quote: The time for action is now, it's never too late to do something.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Don't let yeasterday take too much of today
author: Will Rogers
